lines.text: You think my sister a ho or somethin'? You think she a fuckin' toy?
Naw, man I think she purdy!
You might fuck around and say some shit that'll get you shot.
Shot?
Shot? Ya know? Guns? Bang-bang? This nigga don't know nothin'!
Ms. Hughes, what page fifteen on?
Man, why do you always do that? If you want the last piece, why did you ask me if I want the last piece?
I didn't ask you. But the reason I asked Mike is the same reason you asked Lisa to marry you- it sounds nice, man.
What happened to your rubbers? You had four. I counted. Now one's gone missing.
I don't know what you're talking about, babe.
Who is she?
Who is who?
The ho you fuckin', that's who!
I ain't fuckin' no ho but you!
Time was on crack today.
Now, any other day time drags during the last period. But not today. Naw, time was on crack today!
You would've sworn they were professors at Harvard. They had breath mints down to a science.
Ya'll must think I'm stupid like one of those Thelma & Louise bitches!
Nah, Nah----
Car broke down?! Tell that fool he could at least faced me like a man!
But, But--
I'm not gon' cry! I'm not! I spent too much time on this damn make-up!
Lisa, calm down...
I am calm!
So then why are you yellin'?
